  • Uses of QuestionLoader in com.bitbybit.input

    Classes in com.bitbybit.input that implement QuestionLoader
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CSVQuestionLoader
    Implements the QuestionLoader interface to load Jeopardy questions from a CSV file.
    class 
    JSONQuestionLoader
    Implements the QuestionLoader interface to load Jeopardy questions from a JSON file.
    class 
    XMLQuestionLoader
    Implements the QuestionLoader interface to load Jeopardy questions from an XML file.
    Methods in com.bitbybit.input that return QuestionLoader
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    QuestionLoader
    CSVQuestionLoaderFactory.createQuestionLoader(String filepath)
    Creates a new CSVQuestionLoader if the provided filepath ends with ".csv" (case-insensitive).
    QuestionLoader
    JSONQuestionLoaderFactory.createQuestionLoader(String filepath)
    Creates a new JSONQuestionLoader if the provided filepath ends with ".json" (case-insensitive).
    abstract QuestionLoader
    QuestionLoaderFactory.createQuestionLoader(String filepath)
    Creates and returns a QuestionLoader instance based on the provided filepath.
    QuestionLoader
    XMLQuestionLoaderFactory.createQuestionLoader(String filepath)
    Creates a new XMLQuestionLoader if the provided filepath ends with ".xml" (case-insensitive).
